Room.Name: Regalia Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Regalia Drive, north of the Oceancrest Amphitheatre.
Room.LongDescription: The entrance to the Amphitheatre is to the south. The large, grassy hill provides space for thousands of people. Some benches are set up but most people are content to sit on the grass and discuss the day's events, problems and other worries. To the north is the Oceancrest Ministry of Knowledge, where the collective knowledge of the town is stored and guarded.
